amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.catchline: Teachers and school nurses; additional contract rights; not affected.
amendatorysection.para: This section and section 85-1528 shall be construed as providing a minimum standard and not as repealing any rule, regulation, order, or other action of a board that provides for additional contract rights pertaining to the same subject matter.
